overview:
Michael became Suite101’s CEO in December 2011, having previously served as Editor in Chief from April 2010.

Prior to joining Suite101, Michael was part of the core transition team (focusing on developer/consumer online experience) at the Symbian Foundation, set up in 2008 to move the world’s then dominant mobile operating system to open source.

Michael was the launch editor for the Channel 4 UK’s launch of 4oD in 2006, Managing Editor for 3 UK 2002-2006, and an editor at Amazon.co.uk in 2000-2001.

He studied physics at the University of New Mexico (1993-1997) and journalism at the University of Arizona (1997-1998).
